name: AE FreeCell
description:
A classic FreeCell game for fun! A most popular attractive card and casino game here.

Any feedback please email us, because we can’t reply on comments. Thanks very much for all your support in our games!

Smooth game play, awesome vivid sound as well as extremely beautiful graphics, which makes this FreeCell game more fun than ever. This Free cell game also offers 1 million standard deals for your select.

If you like classic card and casino games like Solitaire, Spider, FreeCell, Eight Off, Forty Thieves, klondike, Blackjack, slot machine, you shouldn't miss this game!

The main purpose of the game is have 4 home cells with cards in ascending order from Ace to King in each suit. You may using the free cells as placeholders. There are 4 free cells, each can hold one card temporarily. Initially, 52 cards are dealt to the tableau in eight piles, face up all of the cards. And you can see what cards are underneath the top cards. Move cards to cascades in descending order with alternating colors.

Remember that the amount of cards you can move at once is determined by how many empty cells and tableau columns currently you have.

Get it now! Enjoy the game!
